root.name: Don't Shit Your Pants
root.description: OverviewDescribed as a survival-horror game by the author, Don't Shit Your Pants was posted on most mainstream flash gaming sites in February of 2009 by the author known as Rete. The in-game credits attribute the creation of the game to Kenny Lee and Teddy Lee of Decade Studios, now Cellar Door Games.GameplayThe player may collect ten in-game medals (equivalent to achievements) to mark milestones in the pursuit to achieve final medal "You Are the Shit King."It should be noted that in an attempt to appeal towards a players sense of decency, the developers allow for other words to be typed, though this will not replace the term "shit" in-game. In a trans-game comment, the author stated, "If you don't like typing swear words, poo, plop, dump, and so on all work as well."
